text:
ully and constructively:
•  A coach should set an appropriate time and place to share their observations. 
If they wait to give feedback on a past action or situation, their observations will 
not be as powerful because the birth attendant will not necessarily remember 
the event well. Additionally, the coach should be sure that the time and place in 
which they choose to give feedback is not threatening or embarrassing for the 
birth attendant.
